mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS comment_id, c.board_id AS board_id, m.nick_name AS nick_name, c.head_comment AS headComment, c.contents AS contents, c.upload_date AS uploadDate, c.edit_date AS editDate, c.delete_date AS deleteDate FROM comment c JOIN member m ON m.member_id = c.MEMBER_ID WHERE c.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, HEAD_COMMENT, CONTENTS, UPLOAD_DATE) SELECT #{boardId}, m.MEMBER_ID,#{headComment}, #{contents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM member m WHERE m.NICK_NAME = #{nickName}
